name: Swivel Sketch
description:
Time to create some art with a blocky canvas, but it seems the only way you can paint is by rotating the art you already have! Solve the puzzles and see how many stars you can get!

Made in 48 hours for the Kenney Jam 2021. Art and sound by Kenney, programming and design by RNGames.

Controls:

  • Click and Drag: Rotate Blocks
  • Ctrl Z: Undo
  • Ctrl A: Toggle image vision
  • Ctrl S: Skip
  • Ctrl R: Restart

Stuff I Used:

Art

  • UI Pack: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/ui-pack
  • Game Icons: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/game-icons
  • 1-Bit Pack: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack

Audio

  • Interface Sounds:  https://www.kenney.nl/assets/interface-sounds
  • UI Audio:  https://www.kenney.nl/assets/ui-audio
  • Music Jingles:  https://www.kenney.nl/assets/music-jingles
